nodes.text: Tatrang VI was a ringed gas giant–type planet with twenty-three moons that was located within the Tatrang system, a part of the Outer Rim Territories' Tammuz sector. It occupied the sixth orbital position around the system's star, the red giant Tatrang. The planet was considered to hold little economic value.

Tatrang VI was first mentioned in the 1992 sourcebook Planets of the Galaxy, Volume Two, which was written by John Terra for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Tatrang system, and therefore Tatrang VI, in grid square U-14.
